myStory.title: Hey guys!
myStory.intro: I'm 10 years old and I'm in the 7th grade. As you can see, I am totally obsessed with LEGOs! I built my first set when I was just 7, and I haven't stopped since.
myStory.passion: I love making huge projects like this stadium. When I'm not building, I'm usually outside playing football with my friends. Thanks for checking out my stuff!
